# invalidate()

**Instance Method**

Marks the receiver as invalid and posts an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Port/didBecomeInvalidNotification] to the default notification center.

## Declaration

```swift
func invalidate()
```

## Discussion

You must call this method before releasing a port object (or removing strong references to it if your application is garbage collected).

## Validation

- **isValid**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is valid.
